name: Little Sheep Journey
description:
Little Sheep Journey is small platform game that I'm developing for my kids.
It gives challenges for little ones, while having us the elder entertained as well.

My main concept is to remove the need for side jumps, as my daughter doesn't yet know how to press two buttons at once. This brought some interesting mechanics to the game. For elder players there's a time challenge play mode, which brings fun and joy with this casual pretty platform game.
